name: Hand Embroidery
description: Learn the art of hand embroidery and create beautiful, intricate designs with this training program aimed at unemployed women.

name: Block Batik
description: Discover the traditional technique of block batik printing and create unique textiles in this empowering training program.

name: Tie Dye
description: Unleash your creativity with tie-dye artistry and learn to craft vibrant, one-of-a-kind garments in this hands-on program.

name: Tailoring
description: Master the art of tailoring and sewing, gaining valuable skills to create custom clothing and accessories.

name: Elegant Evening Gown
description: A stunning evening gown with intricate lace detailing and a flowing silhouette, perfect for special occasions.

name: Business Chic Blazer
description: A tailored blazer designed for professional women, featuring a modern cut and high-quality fabric.

name: Classy Trench Coat
description: A timeless trench coat with a flattering belt and durable construction, ideal for rainy days.

name: Chic Tailored Jumpsuit
description: A stylish jumpsuit with a tailored fit, designed to make a fashion statement at any event.

name: Casual Denim Jacket
description: A versatile denim jacket with a relaxed vibe, perfect for adding a trendy edge to your outfit.
